Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling

Class ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling.ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions
public class ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions extends Object
Provides utility functions for handling WebElement exceptions.

This class defines methods to recover from common Selenium exceptions such as NoSuchElementException, TimeoutException, and StaleElementReferenceException. It aims to improve test stability by implementing fallback strategies for locating and interacting with elements.

    • handleStaleElement

      public static Object handleStaleElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element, WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args)
      Handles a stale element reference by attempting to re-locate the element.
      Parameters:
      driver - The WebDriver instance.
      element - The stale SmartWebElement.
      webElementAction - The action to be performed on the element.
      args - Additional arguments required for the action.
      Returns:
      The result of the attempted action.

    • handleNoSuchElement

      public static Object handleNoSuchElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element, WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args)
      Handles the case where an element is not found by searching within iframes.
      Parameters:
      driver - The WebDriver instance.
      element - The SmartWebElement that was not found.
      webElementAction - The action to be performed if the element is found.
      args - Additional arguments required for the action.
      Returns:
      The result of the attempted action if the element is found.
      Throws:
      org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException - If the element cannot be found in any iframe.

    • handleElementClickIntercepted

      public static Object handleElementClickIntercepted(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element, WebElementAction webElementAction, Exception exception, Object... args)
      Handles the case where an element is intercepted by another element when clicked.
      Parameters:
      driver - The WebDriver instance.
      element - The SmartWebElement that was intercepted.
      webElementAction - The action to be retried after waiting for the blocker to disappear.
      exception - The exception that occurred during the click action.
      args - Additional arguments required for the action.
      Returns:
      The result of the attempted action.

    • handleElementNotInteractable

      public static Object handleElementNotInteractable(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element, WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args)
      Handles the case where an element is not interactable by scrolling to it and retrying the action.
      Parameters:
      driver - The WebDriver instance.
      element - The SmartWebElement that was not interactable.
      webElementAction - The action to be retried.
      args - Additional arguments required for the action.
      Returns:
      The result of the attempted action.
